channel.title: Need new cache for my 525 HELP!
channel.description: I have a 525 client and source with a 525 cache in the C:/ drive. When I downloaded the source+client there was no cache to put into the C:/ drive so I downloaded a seperate 525 cache but don't know how to link the new cache to the client. Everytime I open the client it gets stuck on "Conneting to update server..." and I know the reason it won't continue is because of the cache. Someone please help me. Would really appreciate it.

item.title: Need new cache for my 525 HELP!
item.dc:creator: @jamespk jamespk
item.description:
@jamespk wrote:

yea the [8] SignLink.java (Line 759)
String[] strings = { “c:/cache562/”, “/cache562/”, aString2890, the cache that you need will be any cache from 562 all you need to do is rename the file. i dont know any 562’s atm so just say you get happypkers cache if its a 562 all you do is rename to cache562. also this will work with 525-706 ive tryed most of them

Read full topic

item.title: Need new cache for my 525 HELP!
item.dc:creator: @jamespk jamespk
item.description:
@jamespk wrote:

i cont remeber what class.java it is in but just zfile search for cache in the client and it should tell you then rename the 525 cache in your c drive to what the class#.java says. and also you need to run the server befor u load the client other wise it wont load.

item.title: Need new cache for my 525 HELP!
item.dc:creator: @xXThatOneSkaterKidXx xXThatOneSkaterKidXx
item.description:
@xXThatOneSkaterKidXx wrote:

iiTzSkillz:

Make sure the cache is the same name as it was. IE in cache downloader it’s called “525cache1” go to your C:/ drive and change the name to that.

Is it fine if It’s a seperately downloaded cache?
